string.name: media_location_reason
string.value: Screenshot apps need to read media location information

string.name: read_media_reason
string.value: Screenshot apps need to read media files

string.name: write_media_reason
string.value: Screenshot apps need to write media files

string.name: avscreencapture_privacy_window_content
string.value: %s will be able to record or project everything that's shown on your screen, as well as system sounds. Be sure to safeguard sensitive personal information such as passwords, payment information, photos, videos, and conversations.
